name: Prepare msg for capbility-check
submodel by IdShort (2)
info:
This subflow loads all submodels for a given AAS-Id and filters for a specific idShort.
The AAS-Id has to be the msg.payload.
The flow uses AAS Environments /shells endpoint to retrieve the list of submodels.
The submodels are loaded using AAS Environments /submodels endpoint.
Sbflow enviroment variables can be configured via subflow node:
 - URL to the AAS Environment Server
 - idShort for filtering the submodels

name: Encode shell URL
Encode submodel URL
Filter for idShort
Set Product AAS-Id
Evaluate required processes
Evaluate capability-check result
Evaluate capabilities
